attestation.notes: CC0 declared by Sartoshi (original creator) via Twitter and project site prior to his public exit from the project in May 2022. The declaration preceded his departure, creating governance ambiguity: no successor has revoked it, but the project now lacks an active rights-holder who can reaffirm. Risk flag documented explicitly per project invariant (risk flags are never suppressed). Meme derivative risk: mfers artwork derives visual style from the 'feels guy' / 'Pepe' meme tradition â€” medium risk. Confidence capped at medium (0.55) per project file specification.
